title: Poor Acting
review: Expected a lot from the movie. The story held on but the acting totally amateurish. The protagonist considering he was a boxer in his earlier life showed little courage in the face of diversity. The movie could have been a big hit had the producers had more money to produce this low low budget film.

title: The absolute worst UK mob movie I've ever seen.
review: Thats the only reason I watched this thing, If you can endure the first hour and a half of this tripe, I promise you'll be treated to an even more ridiculous ending to this mess. Good luck.

title: Made of wood inc.
review: Inconsistent accents , miserable . Acting shameful and one to give a miss believe me you'll be better off.
